name: Shoot Yer Booty
description:
Battle against one for your friends in this pirate themed shooter. Control your very own pirate ship, collect health crates and avoid obstacles (kraken tentacles, marine life and islands).

NOTE: YOU WILL NEED ANOTHER FRIEND OR PLAYER FOR THIS GAME.  

Controllers are not required. All players will be sharing a single keyboard. (Press Alt+F4 to exit the game.)

Developed as a prototype game for Yoobee Christchurch: Game Art and Development course.
